name: SSF3
title: Site-Specific Factor 3
subtitle: Measured Thickness (Depth)
notes: **Note:**  Code measured thickness (depth) of tumor not size.  Record actual measurement in tenths of millimeters (mm) from clinical documentation, or from a pathology report if surgery performed.
rows:
00.1 - 97.9 millimeters (mm)
(Exact measurement to nearest tenth of mm)
  
Examples:
    001    00.1 mm    
    002    00.2 mm
    010    01.0 mm    
    074    07.4 mm
    100    10.0 mm
    105    10.5 mm    
    979    97.9 mm
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
Microinvasion; microscopic focus or foci only and no size given
Described as "greater than 3 mm" or "less than or equal to 6 mm"
Described as "greater than 6 mm" or "less than or equal to 9 mm"
Described as "greater than 9 mm" or "less than or equal to 12 mm"
Described as "greater than 12 mm" or "less than or equal to 15 mm"

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
